preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 32.00 g of germanium (Ge). 
 2. Weigh 18.00 g of lithium (Li). 
 3. Weigh 56.00 g of sulfur (S). 
 4. Weigh 65.00 g of zinc (Zn). 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all weighed materials thoroughly using a spatula until uniform.
